Docs.summary: Provides a set of static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods for working with sequences that implement .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task ForEachAsync<T> (this Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IPagedEnumerable<T> source, Action<T> body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task ForEachAsync<T>(class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IPagedEnumerable`1<!!T> source, class System.Action`1<!!T> body, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function ForEachAsync(Of T) (source As IPagedEnumerable(Of T), body As Action(Of T), Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task
static member ForEachAsync : Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IPagedEnumerable<'T> * Action<'T> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The delegate to execute for each element in .
A for controlling the lifetime of the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Iterates over an sequence, invoking a synchronous delegate for each element.
Docs.returns: A that represents the iteration operation. The task completes when iteration is complete.
Docs.remarks: This method processes elements sequentially, not concurrently. That is, for each element in the sequence, the method completes execution of the delegate before processing the next element.
